original_text:
Has the Lord struck her
    as he struck down those who struck her?
Has she been killed
    as those were killed who killed her?
korean_text: 주께서 그 백성을 치셨던들 그 백성을 친 자들을 치심과 같았겠으며 백성이 죽임을 당하였던들 백성을 죽인 자가 죽임을 당함과 같았겠느냐

sentences.original_text: as he struck down those who struck her?
as those were killed who killed her?
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 죽인 자들이 죽임을 당한 것처럼
